verbs.description: [V: expect] [ARG1: more delays on parkway east with single - lane traffic] [ARGM-TMP: this week] [ARGM-LOC: here] the schedule traffic restrictions will be in effect in both directions of interstate 376 parkway east during overnight hours monday through thursday this week penndot says all traffic will be single - lane onlyfrom 9 p m to 5 a m each night in the following areas inbound westbound pittsburgh pennsylvania department of transportation oakland
